Get team schedule results

Source: R/kp_team_tables.R
kp_team_schedule.Rd

Get team schedule results

kp_team_schedule(team, year = 2022)

Arguments

team

Team filter to select.
year

Year of data to pull

Examples

# \donttest{
 try(kp_team_schedule(team = 'Florida St.', year = 2022))
